long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension serves as a bridge between AwsDash.com and AWS services, specifically enhancing communication with the AWS API. It addresses CORS issues associated with S3 API interactions and provides a central repository for the search index used by AwsDash.com 

Key Features:

- Facilitates API Communication: Ensures smooth interaction with AWS APIs, particularly around S3, by handling CORS-related challenges.
- Search Index Storage: Stores and manages the search index that powers AwsDash.com 
- Integration-Only Functionality: Designed to work exclusively as a companion tool for AwsDash.com, and does not offer standalone functionality.

This extension is essential for users of AwsDash.com to ensure seamless integration and efficient management of AWS resources.

[Updates 2024-09-17]
- Add support for multi AWS profiles
- Bugfixes & improvements
